def_en: If you make a U-turn when you are driving or cycling, you turn in a half circle in one movement, so that you are then going in the opposite direction.

def_cn: （政治家在政策、计划、行动方面的）180度大转弯，彻底转变
def_en: If you describe a change in a politician's policy, plans, or actions as a U-turn, you mean that it is a complete change and that they made the change because they were weak or were wrong.
